  • Element
com.citytechinc.cq.component.annotations.widgets

Annotation Type Selection


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface Selection
    Specifies a selection type Widget. A selection may be one of
    1. select
    2. radio
    3. checkbox
    4. combobox
    Represents a Widget of type CQ.form.Selection in Classic UI Represents a Widget of type granite/ui/components/foundation/form/select when using the select type and granite/ui/components/foundation/form/radiogroup when using the radio type in Touch UI Checkbox and combobox are not currently supported in Touch UI rendering

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String dataSource
      Used for Touch UI only Indicates the sling:resourceType of the data source provider.
      boolean multiple
      Used for Touch UI only Indicates whether multiple values may be picked for the selection
      Option[] options
      An explicitly enumerated set of options for the selection.
      String optionsProvider
      Used for Classic UI only A function or the name of a function that will be called on processRecords to receive the options.
      String optionsUrl
      Used for Classic UI only The URL from which options are to be pulled.
      String sortDir
      Used for Classic UI only The sort direction of the the options.
      String type
      The type of the selection.

    • Element Detail

      • options

        public abstract Option[] options
        An explicitly enumerated set of options for the selection. Note: if your options are returned dynamically via a URL, use the optionsUrl property.
        Returns:
        Default:
        {}

      • optionsUrl

        public abstract String optionsUrl
        Used for Classic UI only The URL from which options are to be pulled. Note: setting this to anything other than an empty string overrides any settings made in the options property.
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • optionsProvider

        public abstract String optionsProvider
        Used for Classic UI only A function or the name of a function that will be called on processRecords to receive the options. The function must return an array of options.
        Returns:
        String
        See Also:
        Options
        Default:
        ""

      • sortDir

        public abstract String sortDir
        Used for Classic UI only The sort direction of the the options. If "ASC" or "DESC" the options will be sorted by its (internationalized) text.
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""

      • type

        public abstract String type
        The type of the selection. One of "checkbox", "radio", "select" or "combobox". "checkbox" is the only type that supports mulitple values.
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        "radio"

      • multiple

        public abstract boolean multiple
        Used for Touch UI only Indicates whether multiple values may be picked for the selection
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • dataSource

        public abstract String dataSource
        Used for Touch UI only Indicates the sling:resourceType of the data source provider. For more information on DataSources, see http://docs.adobe.com/docs/en/cq/current/touch-ui/granite-reference.html #Datasource
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""
